page.title: 03MIGDALE HOSPITAL, BONAR
page.content: {Migdale Hospital}is situated above the village and below the school. It is an old people's hospital. It originated as a poorhouse in 1870, when it was called{Swordale House.}Over beside the hospital is a nurses' home. There is a total number of staff of 43. There are 26 nurses working at the hospital at the moment. 10 are on night shift and 16 on day shift. There is a chef and he has 2 lady assistants. The doctor is a local practioner. There is also a gardener. At the moment, the total number of patients is 42. The patients can go 3 times a week to the Occupational Therapy Dept. At Occupational Therapy, the patients make purses, stools, coat hangers, etc. On Mondays and Fridays, old people from the village go there to the day centre.
